sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for July 31 - August 1

day: Bridge Deck Overlay Work for I-75S at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
event: 10 p.m. Sunday August 1 thru 6 a.m. Monday August 2:  Traffic control set-up and lanes will begin closing.

day: Bridge Deck Overlay Work for I-75S at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
event: Monday August 2 thru Labor Day weekend - 6 a.m. thru midnight each weekday:  Two lanes will be closed and two lanes will remain open (including the shoulder).

day: Bridge Deck Overlay Work for I-75S at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
event: Speed limit will be reduced to 55 mph.  Motorists can expect delays in this area.
Concert With The Stars: Summer Edition at the Lexington Opera House at 8:00 p.m.
